common.tagline: You're not alone in your grief

landing.heroTitle: Healing begins when you're not alone
landing.heroSubtitle: A safe space to connect, share, and find comfort during your grief journey. Whether with people who understand or compassionate AI companions — someone is always here for you.
landing.featureChatDesc: Talk to compassionate AI companions anytime, or connect with people who truly understand what you're going through.
landing.featureResourcesDesc: Discover books, series, movies, and more recommended by others who have walked a similar path.
landing.featureTherapistsDesc: Connect with verified grief therapists, read reviews, and find the right professional for your journey.
landing.featureCommunityDesc: Search for others who have experienced similar losses and build meaningful connections.
landing.aboutUsDesc: sanemos.ai was born from the need to find a safe, non-judgmental space to process grief. We believe that healing is not a linear path, and sometimes, all we need is to feel heard. Our platform combines the empathy of a real community with the round-the-clock availability of artificial intelligence companions trained to offer comfort and support in the darkest moments. Because no one should have to walk through grief alone.
